title: Runway Gen-3 Alpha adds storyboard workflow for creators
summary: Runway expands its Gen-3 Alpha toolkit with a storyboard workflow and new camera presets for faster video generation.

title: Krea introduces LoRA remix tools inside its SDXL editor
summary: Krea's SDXL editor now supports LoRA remixing, enabling artists to blend styles without leaving the workflow.

title: ComfyUI community ships open-source controlnet for Veo-style shots
summary: The ComfyUI community has released a Veo-inspired controlnet pack to simplify cinematic framing in image-to-video projects.

title: Pika adds multi-track audio editor for AI video workflows
summary: Pika's latest update ships a multi-track audio editor with automatic ducking tuned for AI-generated video campaigns.

title: Stable Diffusion XL gains new IP-Adapter for portrait lighting
summary: Stability AI's SDXL release comes with an IP-Adapter tuned for portrait lighting and cleaner outpainting boundaries.

title: TikTok partners with creators on AI-generated ad campaign
summary: TikTok's marketing team collaborates with influencers on an AI-generated ad campaign showcasing new creative workflows.

title: Instagram experiments with generative meme templates for brands
summary: Instagram is piloting generative meme templates to help brands launch viral social campaigns faster.

title: Viral marketing playbook: how agencies use Gen-3 for product reveals
summary: Creative agency CMO Lab shares a case study on using Runway Gen-3 for immersive product reveal campaigns.

title: YouTube launches brand-safe AI music generator for advertisers
summary: YouTube introduces a brand-safe AI music generator with campaign presets and licensing built into the workflow.

title: X rolls out campaign analytics dashboard for AI-generated posts
summary: X's new analytics dashboard tracks the performance of AI-generated posts across influencer partnerships and paid ads.

title: NVIDIA invests in Polish data center focused on generative AI
summary: NVIDIA backs a new Polish data center designed for generative AI workloads with high-throughput networking.

title: EU AI Act guidance released for enterprise compliance teams
summary: The European Commission publishes detailed guidance to help enterprise compliance teams prepare for the EU AI Act.

title: Cloud provider unveils low-latency API for real-time RAG video
summary: CloudScale launches a low-latency API optimized for real-time RAG video assistants with enterprise SLAs.

title: Venture round boosts Polish startup building AI governance stack
summary: Warsaw-based startup PolicyGrid secures Series A funding to expand its AI governance and compliance platform.

title: Intel and TSMC discuss joint fab for AI accelerator supply
summary: Intel and TSMC confirm talks on a joint fab aimed at securing accelerator supply for enterprise AI demand.
